overview: For over a decade, Kemper has professionally directed successful product, brand and campaign initiatives in every industry vertical for some of the world’s largest companies. His work has been featured on FOX News, Forbes, MSN, Nature Magazine, Adobe Labs as well as conference presentations at Adobe MAX, Microsoft MIX, Flashforward and Microsoft WPC. He is the recipient of several Art Director’s Club and Addy Awards and has also been recognized by eDesign Magazine and Communication Arts Magazine’s Interactive Annuals. Kemper is also a dedicated educator and mentor in the design community. He has been a graduate studies instructor at Academy of Art University San Francisco and is author of “Advanced Flash Interface Design” published internationally by Apress / friends of ED. Kemper is a constant driving force behind inventing and taking product to market for all of our clients and partners. A lifelong lover of quotations, currently his favorite is: “Behold the turtle. He makes progress only when he sticks his neck out.”
